title: How to register a professional team in OPL?
body:
Hi, i am inquiring about registering a professional team to join the OPL.
What are the requirements, Cost if any, etc.

Kind Regards,

King Awesome.

P.S. plz make an illaoi skin asap XD

replies.body:
OPL is a closed competition now, unless you buy out one of the existing teams like Pentanet did to Bombers. No promotions, no relegations, just the same teams in the same league.

P.S. For me, it's not surprising that Bombers would want to leave the competition.
Keep a lookout on social media. I've seen OPL teams post advertisements on Twitter for open tryouts for their academy teams.
thanks for the replies appreciate it a lot :)
